about_the_game:
Welcome to Deadly Survival
Deadly Survival is about the true challenge of survival, where every resource is a valuable asset and every decision is an opportunity or a threat. Rely on your skills, intuition, and ingenuity to withstand danger and save lives in a world where death awaits at every turn.

What is Deadly Survival about? | What is real survival in a post-apocalyptic world?
  • So many weapons and ammunition that you can shoot for hours?
  • An opportunity to build your own New York in a few minutes?
  • Make a mini-gun from two sticks of leaves and a tube?

Deadly Survival is about being an ordinary survivor who got into this cruel world after the apocalypse and can't do anything, neither build nor craft, and weapons are almost impossible to find after the apocalypse, how will you survive in really difficult conditions?

Current Gameplay includes:
Multiplayer
Survive
Explore
Loot

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content
In-game nudity, Gun violence, blood, death, player-made content(chat,voice chat, e.t.c.)

name: Deadly Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650S / AMD Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: What is Deadly Survival about? About the fact that you can't build New York and make a machine gun out of a stick, find millions of rounds of ammunition around every corner... Deadly Survival is about survival, can you survive without these familiar conditions?
